document_data.name: Disciples of the Free Word
document_data.orgname: the Disciples of the Free Word
document_data.mainbody: The '''Disciples of the Free Word''', who were often mockingly called called the '''Pens of the Poor''', was a monastic order devoted to [[Deneir]], the Lord of All Glyphs.
document_data.Activities: The Disciples of the Free Word served the [[Chuch of Deneir]] by providing scribe services to destitute individuals who could not otherwise afford such services.
